subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Artem Anisimov’s second-period goal held up for the Rangers on Saturday in a 2-1 victory over the Flyers, a fellow Atlantic Division team having a season every bit as disappointing as they are having.
snippet: Artem Anisimov’s second-period goal held up for the Rangers on Saturday in a 2-1 victory over the Flyers, a fellow Atlantic Division team having a season every bit as disappointing as they are having.
